name: 蘇評揮
objective: 本課程將未來個人化智慧型捷運車輛科技發展如何面對都市化人口集中、高車輛密度所造成之環境衝擊，能源短缺之節能需求，個人差異化之個人便捷智慧化車輛之需求，及與未來都會新交通網結合之最後一哩路之未來車發展之動向。課程中將以系統、組件、基礎學理介紹未來車之整車發展趨勢、動力種類及性能的追求方向、輕量化結構之材料創新、新能源之應用與系統管理科技之發展。本內容讓學生了解在未來的車輛發展變遷下其所應具備的基本知識。
schedule:
Teaching Methodology and Teaching Activities: 
��	Weeks 1~2: Introduction of the Smart City, Smart Transportation, Public Transportation, and Last-mile Transportation Solution.
��	Weeks 3~4: Bench Marking World-wide Personal Last-mile Transportation Solution to Personal Rapid Transit.
��	Weeks 5~6: Team Work Grouping and Site-planning; Site Selection, Business Model Innovation, and Operation System Framework.
��	Weeks 7~8: Intelligent Personal Rapid Transit System (iPRT) Design including Station, Track, Vehicle, Operation, and Business Plan.
��	Weeks 9~10: Mid-Term Exam. and Group Presentation.
��	Weeks 11~12: iPRT Vehicle System Design including Requirements Analysis, System Specifications, and Cost-performance Analysis.
��	Weeks 13~14: iPRT Vehicle Propulsion System including Motor/ Controls, Battery/ Energy Management.
��	Weeks 15~16: iPRT Vehicle Chassis and Electronics including Chassis/ Structure, Safety and Intelligent Electrical Features and Electronic Controls.
��	Weeks 17~18: Final Exam. & Group Presentation.
scorePolicy: Grade: Mid-Term Test 20%, Mid-Term Presentation 20%, Final Exam. 30%, Final Presentation 30%.
materials: Textbook(s) and References: Class Notes Prepared by Instructor
